DOC.HEADLINE: HUNGARY TRAIN DERAILS ; AT LEAST 21 KILLED
DOC.TEXT: An express_train headed from eastern Hungary to Budapest derailed Friday and slammed into a station building , killing at least 21 people . At least 60 people were injured , National Police spokesman Laszlo Garamvoelgyi said . The accident occurred at Szajol , about 40 miles southeast of the Hungarian_capital , when the second car of an express_train derailed and dragged three other cars off the tracks . The overturned carriages smashed into the station building , railway officials said .
